statements: SELECT * FROM user_activity;
SELECT user_id, activity_type, activity_timestamp FROM user_activity WHERE user_id = '123456';
SELECT * FROM user_activity WHERE activity_type = 'login' ORDER BY activity_timestamp DESC;
SELECT interaction_type, interaction_content FROM user_activity WHERE user_id = '789012';
SELECT user_id, JSON_VALUE(performance_evaluation, '$.rating') AS rating FROM user_activity WHERE activity_type = 'feedback';
SELECT * FROM user_activity WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND activity_type = 'login';
SELECT user_id, activity_type, activity_timestamp FROM user_activity WHERE interaction_type = 'click' ORDER BY activity_timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, interaction_content, performance_evaluation FROM user_activity WHERE activity_type = 'view' LIMIT 10;
SELECT DISTINCT activity_type FROM user_activity WHERE user_id = '98765f4e-82e3-11ea-bc55-0242ac130003';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_activities FROM user_activity GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_activities > 5 ORDER BY total_activities DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email, date_registered FROM users ORDER BY date_registered DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'John Doe';
SELECT user_id, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'like' ORDER BY interaction_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, interaction_type, interaction_details FROM user_interactions WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE date_registered > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE date_registered > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'Like' ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_interactions FROM user_interactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_interactions > 5;
SELECT user_id, interaction_type, interaction_details FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_date BETWEEN '2022-03-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM user_activity
SELECT user_id, activity_id FROM user_activity ORDER BY activity_timestamp DESC
SELECT activity_type, COUNT(*) FROM user_activity GROUP BY activity_type
SELECT user_id, SUM(metric_value) FROM user_performance GROUP BY user_id HAVING SUM(metric_value) > 100
SELECT user_id, interaction_type, interaction_timestamp FROM interaction_log ORDER BY interaction_timestamp
SELECT * FROM interaction_log WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) FROM user_activity GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 10;
SELECT user_id, AVG(metric_value) AS avg_value FROM user_performance WHERE evaluation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT DISTINCT user_id, interaction_type FROM interaction_log WHERE interaction_timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND interaction_timestamp < '2022-02-01';
SELECT ua.user_id, ua.activity_id, up.metric_value FROM user_activity ua JOIN user_performance up ON ua.user_id = up.user_id WHERE up.performance_metric = 'completion_rate';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT course_id, course_name, instructor_id FROM courses ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, course_id, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'completed' ORDER BY interaction_date ASC;
SELECT assessment_id, assessment_type, score FROM assessments WHERE score >= 90 ORDER BY submission_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE join_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT user_id, course_name, instructor_id FROM courses WHERE start_date <= '2022-06-30' AND end_date >= '2022-06-30' ORDER BY course_name DESC;
SELECT assessment_id, assessment_type, score FROM assessments WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND score >= 80 ORDER BY assessment_type ASC, submission_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'comment' AND interaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT course_name, instructor FROM courses WHERE instructor = 'John Doe';
SELECT user_id, course_id FROM enrollments ORDER BY enrollment_date DESC;
SELECT evaluation_id, evaluation_score FROM performance_evaluations WHERE course_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT course_name, instructor FROM courses ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT user_id, course_id, enrollment_date FROM enrollments WHERE user_id = 2 ORDER BY enrollment_date ASC;
SELECT user_id, course_id, evaluation_score FROM performance_evaluations WHERE evaluation_score > 4.5;
